thread.title: Donald Trump jumps out at children waiting to tour the White House
thread.title_full: Donald Trump jumps out at children waiting to tour the White House

author: George Fuller
title: Donald Trump jumps out at children waiting to tour the White House
text:
Donald Trump jumps out at children waiting to tour the White House Watch | Donald Trump jumps out at children waiting to tour the White House 01:03 George Fuller , video source 7 March 2017 â€¢ 5:39pm 
A s tours of the White House resume, U.S. President Donald Trump made an unplanned appearance by surprising school children who were waiting to tour the residence. 
The president jumps out from behind a wooden partition to the deafening screams of the children. US President Donald J. Trump greets people on a public tour of the White House Credit: ERIK S. LESSER/EPA 
H e even called one boy over to take a quick photo with him - right next to a portrait of Hilary Clinton. 
After few more photos and a wave, he tells the group to "work hard", before getting back to work himself. 10-year-old Jack Cornish, from Alabama, poses for a photo with Trump Credit: ERIK S. LESSER/EPA
